courses.title: Guitar Mastery for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of playing guitar, from basic chords to your first songs. Perfect for absolute beginners.

courses.title: Piano Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the piano with our comprehensive beginner's course. Learn proper technique, music theory, and play beautiful melodies.

courses.title: Vocal Training 101
courses.description: Develop your singing voice with professional vocal techniques, breathing exercises, and performance skills.

courses.title: Music Production with Ableton
courses.description: Learn professional music production techniques using Ableton Live. Create, record, and produce your own tracks.

courses.title: Drumming Essentials
courses.description: Master the drums with our comprehensive course covering basic beats, fills, and essential techniques.

courses.title: Music Theory Fundamentals
courses.description: Build a solid foundation in music theory to enhance your musical understanding and performance.
